name: Noise Cancelling Headphones
description:
Experience immersive sound with advanced noise cancellation technology.
Designed for long listening sessions with soft ear cushions and adjustable fit.
Delivers deep bass, clear vocals, and balanced audio performance.
Ideal for travel, work, and daily music enjoyment.

name: Bluetooth Portable Speaker
description:
Compact speaker with powerful sound output and deep bass response.
Wireless Bluetooth connectivity ensures quick and stable pairing.
Built with durable materials for both indoor and outdoor use.
Perfect for parties, trips, and casual listening.

name: Samsung s22 ultra
description:
High-performance smartphone with a stunning edge-to-edge display.
Powered by a fast processor for smooth multitasking and gaming.
Advanced camera system captures sharp photos and videos.
Supports 5G connectivity for ultra-fast internet speeds.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description:
Track your daily activity, heart rate, and sleep patterns accurately.
Features a bright display with customizable watch faces.
Water-resistant design suitable for workouts and outdoor activities.
Seamlessly syncs with your smartphone for notifications.

name: Earbuds
description:
Lightweight earbuds offering clear sound and strong bass.
Comes with a compact charging case for extended battery life.
Provides stable wireless connectivity with low latency.
Perfect for calls, workouts, and everyday use.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description:
Mechanical keyboard designed for fast and accurate key response.
Features customizable RGB lighting for a stylish gaming setup.
Durable keys ensure long-lasting performance.
Ideal for gaming, coding, and productivity tasks.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description:
Ergonomic mouse built for precision and comfort.
High-accuracy sensor delivers smooth and responsive movement.
Wireless design reduces cable clutter on your desk.
Perfect for gaming and everyday computer use.

name: Macbook Pro
description:
Powerful macbook with a large, high-resolution display.
Handles multitasking, development, and creative work efficiently.
Slim and lightweight design for easy portability.
Reliable battery life for long working hours.

name: 4K Ultra HD Smart TV
description:
Enjoy stunning visuals with 4K Ultra HD resolution.
Smart TV features provide access to popular streaming apps.
Delivers vibrant colors and sharp image quality.
Ideal for movies, sports, and gaming.

name: Redmi Pad Pro 5g
description:
Versatile tablet with a large and responsive touch display.
Suitable for browsing, entertainment, and light productivity.
Slim design makes it easy to carry anywhere.
Long-lasting battery supports extended usage.

name: USB-C Fast Charging Power Bank
description:
High-capacity power bank for charging devices on the go.
Supports fast charging through USB-C output.
Compact and lightweight for easy portability.
Ideal for travel and daily backup power.

name: 1080p HD Webcam
description:
Delivers clear and sharp video quality for online meetings.
Built-in microphone ensures clear voice capture.
Easy plug-and-play setup with most devices.
Perfect for streaming, video calls, and remote work.
